alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Texas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 12:59PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in south central Missouri, Texas. In southwest Missouri, Christian, Douglas, Ozark, Webster and Wright. * WHEN...Until 930 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1259 PM CST, Trained weather spotters and the Missouri Department of Transportation reported that low water crossings that commonly flood were flooded across the advisory area. - This includes the following low water crossings... Little Beaver Creek at County Road 447, Beaver Creek at Crewes Ford Road, Bryant Creek at County Road 223, Little Piney River at Union Road, Beaver Creek at County Road 524, Big Piney River at Cleveland Road and Swan Creek at Swan Cave Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mountain Grove, Ava, Houston, Licking, Seymour, Mansfield, Norwood, Hartville, Dawson, Duncan, Huggins, Plato, Odin, Brushyknob, Manes, Graff, Bendavis, Squires, Dogwood, Goodhope, Success, Rome, Roby, Bucyrus, Elkhead, Keltner, Hazelton, Prescott and Garrison. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Texas; Webster; Wright
